dsOverview.title: NASA International Satellite Cloud Climatology Project (ISCCP) D1

summary.p: Gridded cloud products for each 3-hour period during a day on a global, 280km equal-area grid

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: NASA/GSFC/ESD/GISS > Goddard Institute for Space Studies, Earth Sciences Directorate, Goddard Space Flight Center, NASA

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Clouds > Cloud Amount/Frequency
dsOverview.project: ISCCP > International Satellite Cloud Climatology Project
